properties.Observatio: There are large trees at some places on both sides of the bank. But banks are eroded. Too much water flows in rainy season.
properties.Descript_1:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing

Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 
1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed 
seedlings and planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m

properties.Descriptio: Mahaweli rever - A building is constructed at the reservation area of Mahaweli River, below the Mahawilawatta Estate
properties.Observatio: There are large trees at some places on both sides of the bank. But banks are eroded. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, waste have been dumped into streams, and in some places. There are also unauthorized construction.
